snippet.title: Circuit Superstars | Release Trailer | Square Enix Collective | English | [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Circuit Superstars is out now on Xbox One and Steam (PC)
Xbox One: https://sqex.link/wbzz
Steam: https://sqex.link/tmu4

Circuit Superstars is available to buy right now on Steam and Xbox One. Follow the link to find out more: https://sqex.link/vjqn

Circuit Superstars is a top-down racer built by racing fans, for racing fans. Celebrating generations of racing, focusing on driving that feels great – but with a high skill ceiling, that will have players spending hours honing their perfect lap. 

Starting out in Circuit Superstars is simple, but learning the nuances of each car’s handling and finding the best racing line through each corner of each track will be a challenge for a long time to come. Not only that, but with the option of fuel usage, tire degradation and racing damage, even a good pit stop strategy could make the difference between hero and zero. Feel the rubber bite into the road as you pass the start/finish line and dive, brakes squealing, into the first corner!

###
Don't forget to like this video and subscribe to Square Enix Collective on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/squareenixcollective

Follow Square Enix Collective
***On Twitter: twitter.com/SQEXCollective 
***On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sqexcollective
***On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SquareEnixCollective

Square Enix Collective® is a London-based division of Square Enix LTD., providing publishing services to indie developers around the world.
We're always on the look-out for great new projects and talented teams worldwide.
To learn more about Square Enix Collective head to our website at:
https://collective.square-enix-games.com/

#CircuitSuperstars #Trailer
